thread.title: Kim Kardashian baby shower postponed amid Lamar Odom situation, report says
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian baby shower postponed amid Lamar Odom situation, report says

title: Kim Kardashian baby shower postponed amid Lamar Odom situation, report says
text:
Kim Kardashian baby shower postponed amid Lamar Odom situation, report says October 15, 2015 6:54 PM By FRANK LOVECE. Special to Newsday 
advertisement | advertise on newsday 
Us Weekly said Thursday that Kardashian, who turns 35 on Wednesday, had accompanied her younger sister and their mother, Kris Jenner, to the Las Vegas hospital where former NBA player Odom was on life support after having been found unresponsive at a legal brothel in Nevada. 
Odom's children, Destiny, 17, and Lamar Jr., 13, and his father, Joe, arrived in Las Vegas Wednesday night to be at the former NBA player's bedside. 
Coming soon: Newsday's Entertainment newsletter, for the latest on celebs, TV, more.
